long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily keep track of time in multiple cities worldwide with the World Clock extension. Perfect for frequent travelers, remote workers, or anyone with friends and family in different parts of the world, this extension lets you view the current time in selected time zones directly from your browser.

Features:
- Quickly add and remove time zones with a simple interface.
- Real-time clock updates every second.
- Customize your list of time zones to match your needs.
